scripts.prisma:db:pull: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma generate
scripts.dev:migration:run: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.dev:migration:generate: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:seed: npm run dev:load-envs npx prisma db seed
scripts.test:migration:run: npm run test:load-envs npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:migration:generate: npm run test:load-envs npx prisma migrate dev
